example.text: Mutations in this region are able to disrupt keratin filament assembly, leading to degeneration or cytolysis of keratinocytes.

The zinc finger motif, which specifically recognizes the GO:C pair, is firmly fixed with respect to the C-terminal domain by the hydrogen bond network, so the Lys147Ala substitution has the ability to disrupt the interaction, resulting in a drastic decrease of activity against GO:C substrates.
example.arg: a drastic decrease of activity against GO:C substrates
